6 The OLE-Server Library

6.7 The OLE-SERVER module

This section contains reference entries for interfaces in the OLE-Server module.

Note: Because OLE-Server uses and then reexports many interfaces from Functional Developer's low-level OLE/COM API libraries it is not practical to provide entries here for all of them. You should look at the library.dylan file in the Sources\ole\ole-server folder in your Functional Developer installation for the complete picture.

6.7.7 - OLE API hooks

6.7.9 - Persistent storage for in-process compound document servers
